name: Ulysses Étonnant Québec! 150 expériences insolites 1e edition
description: Amazing Quebec! 150 Unusual Experiences invites readers and curious travelers to discover Quebec from a new perspective. Think outside the box and to be pleasantly surprised! Sleep in a cave, a submarine or a tree; have a drink in a tiki bar, dine between heaven and earth, or learn how to cook insects; raft at night or surf in winter; feed a moose or scratch the belly of a wolf; participate in the harvest or visit a hydroelectric dam. This guide offers a rich selection of Quebec's most interesting attractions and unusual experiences.
